title: Iterative Learning Control (ILC) Simulation Education for Periodic Disturbance Rejection

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic control system theory and feedback control principles
context.additional_context: Practical training for administrators on periodic noise reduction in language processing systems

learning_goals: Learners can analyze periodic disturbance characteristics and conduct iterative experiments (three or more times) using simulation tools
Learners can design reference signals that reduce system measurement errors by 30% or more by applying ILC algorithms
Learners can explain step-by-step the process of eliminating periodic disturbances in feedback control systems in VR environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
